Description: Book of Caverns of Nedjmet, showing Division 2, Register 3, Scenes 2 and 3; sheet 1; black line and red/black vignettes with Hieroglyphic and Hieratic text in red and black ink.
Curator's comments: Lenzo, G. 2023. The Use of Hieratic in Funerary Texts During the 21st and 22nd Dynasties, in: Gerhards, S. et al. (ed.), Schöne Denkmäler sind entstanden: Studien zu Ehren von Ursula Verhoeven, Heidelberg: Propylaeum: 305. Niwiński, A. 1989, Studies on the Illustrated Theban Funerary Papyri of the 11th and 10th centuries BC. OBO 86, Fribourg-Göttingen, p l.49a.-c (partial). Lenzo, G. 2023. The Book of the Dead in the Third Intermediate Period, in: Lucarelli, R. and M.A. Stadler (eds), The Oxford Handbook of the Egyptian Book of the Dead (online edn, Oxford Academic, 20 June 2023), 89.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (126)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (134518) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/134518)
